00035 class DLLDIR Exception : public libebt::Backtraceable<ExceptionTag>,
00036                                                  public std::exception {
00037     protected:
00038         const std::string _message;
00039                 const int _error_number;
00040 
00041     public:
00042         Exception(const std::string & message, const int error_number) throw () :
00043             libebt::Backtraceable<ExceptionTag>(),
00044             std::exception(),
00045             _message(message), _error_number(error_number) {
00046         }
00047 
00048         virtual ~Exception() throw () {
00049         }
00050 
00051         std::string message() const throw() {
00052             return _message;
00053         }
00054         const char* what() const throw() {
00055             return _message.c_str();
00056         }
00057 
00058         const int error_number() const throw() {
00059             return _error_number;
00060         }
00061 };
